title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 151 - Workers' Compensation Insurance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 151 - Workers' Compensation Insurance

State Regulations

Subpart 151-1 - Rate Filings Prior Approval (§ 151-1.0 to 151-1.3)

Subpart 151-2 - Industry Standard Rate For Aggregate Trust Fund (§ 151-2.1 to 151-2.3)

Subpart 151-3 - Workplace Safety And Loss Prevention Incentive Program (§ 151-3.1 to 151-3.10)

Subpart 151-4 - Reserves For Special Disability Fund Claims (§ 151-4.1 to 151-4.3)

Subpart 151-5 - Independent Livery Driver Benefit Fund (§ 151-5.0 to 151-5.1)

Subpart 151-6 - Workers' Compensation Insurance Assessments (§ 151-6.0 to 151-6.2)

Subpart 151-7 - Workers'Compensation Safe Patient Handling Program (§ 151-7.0 to 151-7.3)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 151

Statutory authority: Financial Services Law, §§
202, 302; Insurance Law, §§201, 210, 301, 1303, 2305, 2307, 3451, 4117; Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 15[8][h][4], 25-A[3], 27, 32[i], 151[2][b]; L. 2007, ch. 6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
